Posted By: ApotheosisCM (3/8/2012 1:29:45 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
[Dismember](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dismember)ing Stuffy is fun, since tearing her insides out would yield lots of cottony goodness.  
  
[Blasphemous Act](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blasphemous Act) + This:  
As the smoke fills up your tiny room there's nothing you can do  
Far too late you see the one inside the box is you  
  
^ Props if you already know what that's from. XD  
  
Also, I used to think she was cute, but if you look close at her face she becomes a lot scarier.  
  
All in all, a very flavorful card. It's a voodoo doll of whosoever you please! 5/5  
---  
@SuperLlama: Yeah, I know, I know. Props if you didn't look it up. And also, if you actually listen to the song, this fits with it a lot more than [Creepy Doll](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Creepy Doll)
posts.html:
